thread.title: BRIEF-Ericsson says selected by SBS/Sanoma for live services
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Ericsson says selected by SBS/Sanoma for live services | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Ericsson says selected by SBS/Sanoma for live services
text:
Sept 8 Ericsson
* Says media group SBS/Sanoma selects Ericsson for live and VOD OTT services
* Says result of a multi-year deal, Ericsson will provide a managed end-to-end OTT platform to deliver live and on-demand TV services Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Stockholm Newsroom)
